body.name: HIGOSPRO Portable Mini Washing Machine, 17 Lbs Capacity Washer and Spinner Combo, 2 in 1 Compact Twin Tub Laundry, Washer& Spinnerwith Built-in Gravity Drain Pump, Ideal for Apartmen, Dorms
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 16 mins
features: 🥼【Twin Tub and 17LBS Capacity】:Feature the twin tub dual function design can save your precious time by washing and spinning dry loads at the same time. With 11 lbs wash capacity and 6 lbs spin capacity,the washer is perfect for washing daily laundry quickly.

👖【Easy to Operate】:Simple design of the operation panel, wash timing, wash options, drain options, and spin timing, more easier to use. Allows you to simply put in your load of clothes, fill with water, set the timer and start washing, completely suitable for everywhere!

👚 【Water and Power Saving】: The HIGOSPRO semi-automatic washing machine is compact and low-powered, saving a lot of water and electricity. The washer's dual motor system presents a powerful washing capacity with washing power (240W) and spinning power (120W), and this unit features a 1300RPM powerful motor with a max frequency of 60Hz. Save your time and wash more clean!

⏱【Separate Time Control & Lint Filter】:Separate timer control for wash and spin operations. Wash timer for 15 min and spin timer for 5 minutes per load. There is two water inlets on the panel for connecting the hose to easily add water. The unit has a lint filter that absorbs debris such as lint, fibers and dust generated during the filtration process, preventing them from affecting the washing results.

🧦【Portable and Widely Used】:The product weighs about 24.25 pounds, the portable mini washer can be easily moved and transported. 22.8" x 12.6" x 25.6" inches in size fits into limited spaces and is easy to store in places such as apartments, dorm rooms, RVs, bathrooms or any other places. You can easily connect to any faucet, whether it's in the kitchen sink or in the bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works well!
reviews.reviewText: I like that is so compact and fits rite in my small home I have a small space to work with and it's perfect. I usually use it to clean my day to day work clothes. It's incredible. I'm very happy to have made this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DONT BUY IT!! IT BROKE IN LESS THAN 5 MONTHS!!!
reviews.reviewText: DONT BUY IT. It didnt last 5 months before it broke! I bought this on august 17, 2023 and as of today, Dec 31, 2023, the washer wont spin! The last time I used this piece of garbage was Dec 22nd, and today (12/23), it suddenly don't wanna work. Please save your money and move elsewhere! I only use this machine twice a month!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This little machine cleans amazingly!
reviews.reviewText: This little washer is amazing.It cleans better than traditional washers!Even though, it requires more effort, hands down, perfect for small spaces.I have been a mini salon owner for 7 years. I have transported my shop laundry ever since, until now.I have washed 3 loads so far.If the spin is too hard after about 30 seconds, reposition your spin.The spin cycle.If you wash a full load, you may have to separate and spin.For me. 1 wash equals 3 separate spins per load.Again, this is salon towels x2 loads and 1 load of capes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: t55555I've tried a couple of these little washers, and I have to say that this one is a cut above the rest. It's easy to use, and it gets my clothes clean and fresh. The price is a bargain, in my opinion, and the washer seems to be well made and sturdy. It does small loads, but if I were traveling, I'd say this is the way to go. We went this route because we're remodeling and until I can get my big ones put in place. I'd say this washer would be ideal for travel, small apartments, dorms, etc, and the quality is very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Worked great tell it didn’t!
reviews.reviewText: I have loved this little washer for 4 months. Today I went to use it and it smells like it’s overheating and will not spin anymore

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little mini washer
reviews.reviewText: I live in an apartment in NYC with no washer or dyer. This product right here saves me a ton of money! Since washing clothes is $2+ for just a small load. So now about the washer, it is very easy to use! It doesn't hold a lot of clothes, but it still works. The only issue I had was with the hoses because it's very cheaply made and feels like I can break it, or it won't last too long. It washes the clothes very well and the spin rings out majority of the water out of the cloths. Less time it'll take to fully dry!! I definitely would recommend this product to anyone that lives in an apartment, RV, or just an emergency washer just in case your actual washer goes out.
